Reviews.Title: My thoughts
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Not quite as advertised.  Not a bad phone, but apparently supposed to be indestructable.  Within days, the screen is already scratched up from touching my shirt pocket.  In addition, texting is difficult.  When pressing the letters, other letters come up instead of what I was pressing.  That aside, not a bad phone.

Reviews.Title: Rugged Android Phone-3.5 Inch Screen
Reviews.Author: Allen Capelle
Reviews.Content: I like it but the screw at the back cannot really tight. Late shipment during christmas but overall it is okay.
